name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

name: Ivysaur
description: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.

name: Venusaur
description: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun’s rays, it fills its body with power.

name: Charmander
description: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander’s life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.

name: Charmeleon
description: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.

name: Charizard
description: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

name: Squirtle
description: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

name: Wartortle
description: When tapped, this Pokémon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

name: Blastoise
description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Caterpie
description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.

name: Metapod
description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

name: Butterfree
description: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.

name: Beedrill
description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Rattata
description: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.

name: Raticate
description: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.

name: Spearow
description: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.

name: Fearow
description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: Ekans
description: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: Arbok
description: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.

name: Pikachu
description: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.

name: Raichu
description: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.

name: Sandshrew
description: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.

name: Sandslash
description: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.

name: Nidoran (female)
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
description: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.

name: Nidoqueen
description: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.

name: Nidoran (male)
description: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.

name: Nidorino
description: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.

name: Nidoking
description: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.

name: Clefairy
description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Clefable
description: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.

name: Vulpix
description: When it is born, it has just one snow-white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: Ninetales
description: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.

name: Jigglypuff
description: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.

name: Wigglytuff
description: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won’t want to be separated.

name: Zubat
description: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.

name: Golbat
description: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: Oddish
description: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

name: Gloom
description: Smells incredibly foul! However, around one out of a thousand people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.

name: Vileplume
description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
description: Growing out of the bug’s back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.

name: Parasect
description: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.

name: Venonat
description: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

name: Venomoth
description: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.

name: Diglett
description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.

name: Dugtrio
description: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

name: Meowth
description: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

name: Persian
description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Psyduck
description: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

name: Golduck
description: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.

name: Mankey
description: It’s unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can’t distinguish friends from foes.

name: Primeape
description: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

name: Growlithe
description: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

name: Arcanine
description: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: Poliwag
description: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.

name: Poliwhirl
description: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.

name: Abra
description: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.

name: Kadabra
description: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong alpha waves that can ruin precision devices.

name: Alakazam
description: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.

name: Machop
description: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
description: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

name: Bellsprout
description: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.

name: Weepinbell
description: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

name: Victreebel
description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: Tentacool
description: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.

name: Tentacruel
description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: Geodude
description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: Graveler
description: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn’t mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.

name: Golem
description: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.

name: Ponyta
description: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.

name: Rapidash
description: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: Slowpoke
description: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.

name: Slowbro
description: An attached Shellder won’t let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

name: Magnemite
description: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.

name: Magneton
description: A linked cluster formed of several Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.

name: Farfetchd
description: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.

name: Doduo
description: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

name: Dodrio
description: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads--even for a second--will get pecked severely.

name: Seel
description: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.

name: Dewgong
description: Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.

name: Grimer
description: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.

name: Muk
description: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.

name: Shellder
description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Cloyster
description: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

name: Gastly
description: Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.

name: Haunter
description: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.

name: Gengar
description: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Onix
description: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.

name: Drowzee
description: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.

name: Hypno
description: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.

name: Krabby
description: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

name: Kingler
description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

name: Voltorb
description: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

name: Electrode
description: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”

name: Exeggcute
description: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.

name: Exeggutor
description: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.

name: Cubone
description: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.

name: Marowak
description: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.

name: Hitmonlee
description: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

name: Hitmonchan
description: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.

name: Lickitung
description: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.

name: Koffing
description: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.

name: Weezing
description: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging Tackles.

name: Rhydon
description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Chansey
description: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.

name: Tangela
description: Many writhing vines cover it, so its true identity remains unknown. The blue vines grow its whole life long.

name: Kangaskhan
description: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

name: Horsea
description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: Seadra
description: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.

name: Goldeen
description: It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger, it will strike back with its sharp horn.

name: Seaking
description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

name: Staryu
description: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core remains intact.

name: Starmie
description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: Mr
description: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.

name: Scyther
description: It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly.

name: Jynx
description: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

name: Electabuzz
description: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish blue.

name: Magmar
description: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather’s body temperature is nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Pinsir
description: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

name: Tauros
description: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.

name: Magikarp
description: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.

name: Gyarados
description: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.

name: Lapras
description: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.

name: Ditto
description: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

name: Eevee
description: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.

name: Vaporeon
description: It prefers beautiful shores. With cells similar to water molecules, it could melt in water.

name: Jolteon
description: Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on end if it becomes charged with electricity.

name: Flareon
description: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.

name: Porygon
description: A man-made Pokémon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.

name: Omanyte
description: A prehistoric Pokémon that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.

name: Omastar
description: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.

name: Kabuto
description: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.

name: Kabutops
description: In the water, it tucks in its limbs to become more compact, then it wiggles its shell to swim fast.

name: Aerodactyl
description: It was regenerated from a dinosaur’s genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.

name: Snorlax
description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

name: Zapdos
description: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
description: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.

name: Dratini
description: It is called the “Mirage Pokémon” because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

name: Dragonair
description: Its crystalline orbs appear to give this Pokémon the power to freely control the weather.

name: Dragonite
description: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.

name: Mewtwo
description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

name: Mew
description: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
description: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up sun rays.

name: Bayleef
description: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

name: Meganium
description: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

name: Cyndaquil
description: It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Quilava
description: Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes.

name: Typhlosion
description: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

name: Totodile
description: It is small but rough and tough. It won’t hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.

name: Croconaw
description: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

name: Feraligatr
description: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.

name: Sentret
description: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.

name: Furret
description: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.

name: Hoothoot
description: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.

name: Noctowl
description: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

name: Ledyba
description: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.

name: Ledian
description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

name: Spinarak
description: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.

name: Ariados
description: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It’s hard to tell which end is which.

name: Crobat
description: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

name: Chinchou
description: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.

name: Lanturn
description: Lanturn’s light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed “The Deep-Sea Star.”

name: Pichu
description: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.

name: Cleffa
description: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

name: Igglybuff
description: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.

name: Togepi
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
description: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.

name: Natu
description: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.

name: Xatu
description: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.

name: Mareep
description: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.

name: Flaaffy
description: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.

name: Ampharos
description: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

name: Bellossom
description: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

name: Marill
description: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.

name: Azumarill
description: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of living things on riverbeds.

name: Sudowoodo
description: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.

name: Politoed
description: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.

name: Hoppip
description: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.

name: Skiploom
description: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.

name: Jumpluff
description: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.

name: Aipom
description: It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.

name: Sunkern
description: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.

name: Sunflora
description: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this Pokémon’s face become more vivid and lively.

name: Yanma
description: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.

name: Wooper
description: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

name: Quagsire
description: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river’s bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.

name: Espeon
description: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.

name: Umbreon
description: The light of the moon changed Eevee’s genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.

name: Murkrow
description: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another’s stashes.

name: Slowking
description: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

name: Misdreavus
description: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.

name: Unown
description: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

name: Wobbuffet
description: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.

name: Girafarig
description: While it sleeps, the head on its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn’t need to sleep.

name: Pineco
description: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

name: Forretress
description: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.

name: Dunsparce
description: When spotted, this Pokémon escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.

name: Gligar
description: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Steelix
description: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.

name: Snubbull
description: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.

name: Granbull
description: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

name: Qwilfish
description: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.

name: Scizor
description: This Pokémon’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets ahold of into bits.

name: Shuckle
description: The berries stored in its jar-like shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.

name: Heracross
description: This powerful Pokémon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.

name: Sneasel
description: It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.

name: Teddiursa
description: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they’re soaked with honey.

name: Ursaring
description: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailingly finds all food buried deep underground.

name: Slugma
description: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.

name: Magcargo
description: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

name: Swinub
description: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Piloswine
description: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.

name: Corsola
description: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure because of its beauty.

name: Remoraid
description: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike moving prey from more than 300 feet away.

name: Octillery
description: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.

name: Delibird
description: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.

name: Mantine
description: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can fly over 300 feet out of the water from the surface of the ocean.

name: Skarmory
description: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

name: Houndour
description: Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes through the area to announce that this is its territory.

name: Houndoom
description: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

name: Kingdra
description: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

name: Phanpy
description: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.

name: Donphan
description: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.

name: Porygon2
description: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.

name: Stantler
description: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.

name: Smeargle
description: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.

name: Tyrogue
description: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

name: Hitmontop
description: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.

name: Smoochum
description: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.

name: Elekid
description: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can’t store the energy it makes.

name: Magby
description: It’s small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.

name: Miltank
description: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.

name: Blissey
description: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.

name: Raikou
description: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

name: Entei
description: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

name: Suicune
description: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.

name: Larvitar
description: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.

name: Pupitar
description: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

name: Tyranitar
description: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.

name: Lugia
description: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.

name: Ho
description: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.

name: Celebi
description: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

name: Treecko
description: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.

name: Grovyle
description: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.

name: Sceptile
description: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

name: Torchic
description: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

name: Combusken
description: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

name: Blaziken
description: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.

name: Mudkip
description: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.

name: Marshtomp
description: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

name: Swampert
description: Its arms are hard as rock. With one swing, it can break a boulder into pieces.

name: Poochyena
description: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

name: Mightyena
description: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

name: Zigzagoon
description: It walks in zigzag fashion. It’s good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.

name: Linoone
description: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.

name: Wurmple
description: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.

name: Silcoon
description: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.

name: Beautifly
description: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.

name: Cascoon
description: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

name: Dustox
description: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.

name: Lotad
description: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can’t swim.

name: Lombre
description: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.

name: Ludicolo
description: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can’t help breaking out into a dance.

name: Seedot
description: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.

name: Nuzleaf
description: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.

name: Shiftry
description: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.

name: Taillow
description: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.

name: Swellow
description: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.

name: Wingull
description: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.

name: Pelipper
description: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.

name: Ralts
description: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.

name: Kirlia
description: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.

name: Gardevoir
description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

name: Surskit
description: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.

name: Masquerain
description: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.

name: Shroomish
description: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

name: Breloom
description: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.

name: Slakoth
description: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.

name: Vigoroth
description: Its heartbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can’t sit still for one second.

name: Slaking
description: The world’s laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there’s no food left within its reach.

name: Nincada
description: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.

name: Ninjask
description: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.

name: Shedinja
description: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.

name: Whismur
description: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.

name: Loudred
description: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.

name: Exploud
description: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.

name: Makuhita
description: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.

name: Hariyama
description: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.

name: Azurill
description: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.

name: Nosepass
description: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.

name: Skitty
description: It can’t stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.

name: Delcatty
description: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.

name: Sableye
description: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.

name: Mawile
description: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

name: Aron
description: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.

name: Lairon
description: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.

name: Aggron
description: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don’t take it lightly.

name: Meditite
description: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.

name: Medicham
description: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

name: Electrike
description: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.

name: Manectric
description: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.

name: Plusle
description: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.

name: Minun
description: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.

name: Volbeat
description: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.

name: Illumise
description: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.

name: Roselia
description: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.

name: Gulpin
description: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.

name: Swalot
description: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.

name: Carvanha
description: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.

name: Sharpedo
description: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”

name: Wailmer
description: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.

name: Wailord
description: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.

name: Numel
description: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.

name: Camerupt
description: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.

name: Torkoal
description: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

name: Spoink
description: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.

name: Grumpig
description: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.

name: Spinda
description: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

name: Trapinch
description: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.

name: Vibrava
description: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.

name: Flygon
description: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.

name: Cacnea
description: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.

name: Cacturne
description: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day’s desert heat.

name: Swablu
description: For some reason, it likes to land on people’s heads softly and act like it’s a hat.

name: Altaria
description: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.

name: Zangoose
description: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.

name: Seviper
description: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.

name: Lunatone
description: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

name: Solrock
description: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.

name: Barboach
description: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.

name: Whiscash
description: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.

name: Corphish
description: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.

name: Crawdaunt
description: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.

name: Baltoy
description: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.

name: Claydol
description: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

name: Lileep
description: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.

name: Cradily
description: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.

name: Anorith
description: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.

name: Armaldo
description: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.

name: Feebas
description: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.

name: Milotic
description: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.

name: Castform
description: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.

name: Kecleon
description: It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

name: Shuppet
description: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice-- or so it’s said. It’s very active at night.

name: Banette
description: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.

name: Duskull
description: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.

name: Dusclops
description: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.

name: Tropius
description: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.

name: Chimecho
description: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.

name: Absol
description: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.

name: Wynaut
description: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

name: Snorunt
description: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.

name: Glalie
description: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.

name: Spheal
description: They can’t swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they’re happy, they clap fins.

name: Sealeo
description: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.

name: Walrein
description: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

name: Clamperl
description: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it’s held.

name: Huntail
description: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.

name: Gorebyss
description: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

name: Relicanth
description: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.

name: Luvdisc
description: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.

name: Bagon
description: Its well-developed neck muscles and iron-like head can smash boulders into pieces.

name: Shelgon
description: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

name: Salamence
description: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

name: Beldum
description: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground’s natural magnetism, letting it float.

name: Metang
description: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won’t be scratched if it collides with a jet.

name: Metagross
description: With four linked brains, it’s more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.

name: Regirock
description: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.

name: Regice
description: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can’t be melted, even by magma.

name: Registeel
description: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.

name: Latias
description: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.

name: Latios
description: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

name: Kyogre
description: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.

name: Groudon
description: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.

name: Rayquaza
description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

name: Jirachi
description: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.

name: Deoxys
description: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.

name: Turtwig
description: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

name: Grotle
description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

name: Chimchar
description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

name: Monferno
description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: Infernape
description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

name: Piplup
description: It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

name: Prinplup
description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

name: Starly
description: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

name: Staravia
description: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.

name: Staraptor
description: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

name: Bibarel
description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Kricketot
description: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.

name: Kricketune
description: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Luxio
description: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

name: Luxray
description: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey--even those taking shelter behind a wall.

name: Budew
description: When it feels the sun’s warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.

name: Roserade
description: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.

name: Cranidos
description: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.

name: Rampardos
description: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.

name: Shieldon
description: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.

name: Bastiodon
description: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.

name: Burmy
description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

name: Mothim
description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.

name: Combee
description: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

name: Vespiquen
description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

name: Pachirisu
description: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

name: Buizel
description: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

name: Floatzel
description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

name: Cherubi
description: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.

name: Cherrim
description: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.

name: Shellos
description: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.

name: Gastrodon
description: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.

name: Ambipom
description: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.

name: Drifloon
description: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

name: Drifblim
description: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

name: Buneary
description: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.

name: Lopunny
description: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

name: Mismagius
description: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.

name: Honchkrow
description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

name: Chingling
description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body’s fluid levels.

name: Mime
description: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy’s movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

name: Happiny
description: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.

name: Spiritomb
description: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

name: Gible
description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

name: Gabite
description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Garchomp
description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Munchlax
description: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.

name: Riolu
description: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.

name: Lucario
description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.

name: Hippopotas
description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

name: Hippowdon
description: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.

name: Skorupi
description: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

name: Drapion
description: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.

name: Croagunk
description: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

name: Toxicroak
description: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
description: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

name: Mantyke
description: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain’s lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”

name: Weavile
description: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.

name: Magnezone
description: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.

name: Lickilicky
description: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

name: Rhyperior
description: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.

name: Tangrowth
description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

name: Electivire
description: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.

name: Magmortar
description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

name: Togekiss
description: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.

name: Yanmega
description: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads instantly while flying by at high speed.

name: Leafeon
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

name: Glaceon
description: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: Mamoswine
description: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.

name: Porygon
description: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

name: Gallade
description: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

name: Probopass
description: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

name: Dusknoir
description: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.

name: Froslass
description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

name: Rotom
description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.

name: Uxie
description: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

name: Mesprit
description: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Azelf
description: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

name: Dialga
description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.

name: Palkia
description: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

name: Cresselia
description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione
description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

name: Arceus
description: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

name: Victini
description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Snivy
description: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Servine
description: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
description: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior’s noble eyes.

name: Tepig
description: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

name: Pignite
description: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.

name: Emboar
description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
description: The scalchop on its stomach isn’t just used for battle--it can be used to break open hard berries as well.

name: Dewott
description: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
description: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

name: Patrat
description: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.

name: Watchog
description: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

name: Lillipup
description: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.

name: Herdier
description: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.

name: Stoutland
description: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

name: Purrloin
description: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.

name: Liepard
description: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

name: Pansage
description: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

name: Simisage
description: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

name: Pansear
description: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.

name: Simisear
description: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

name: Panpour
description: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.

name: Simipour
description: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

name: Munna
description: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.

name: Musharna
description: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

name: Pidove
description: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.

name: Tranquill
description: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.

name: Unfezant
description: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.

name: Blitzle
description: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

name: Zebstrika
description: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

name: Roggenrola
description: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

name: Boldore
description: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.

name: Gigalith
description: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.

name: Woobat
description: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

name: Swoobat
description: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.

name: Drilbur
description: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.

name: Excadrill
description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

name: Audino
description: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

name: Timburr
description: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.

name: Gurdurr
description: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.

name: Conkeldurr
description: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

name: Tympole
description: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.

name: Palpitoad
description: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
description: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.

name: Throh
description: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

name: Sawk
description: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

name: Sewaddle
description: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.

name: Swadloon
description: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

name: Leavanny
description: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

name: Venipede
description: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.

name: Whirlipede
description: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

name: Scolipede
description: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.

name: Cottonee
description: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

name: Whimsicott
description: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.

name: Petilil
description: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

name: Lilligant
description: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.

name: Basculin
description: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.

name: Sandile
description: It moves along below the sand’s surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.

name: Krokorok
description: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

name: Krookodile
description: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.

name: Darumaka
description: Darumaka’s droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.

name: Darmanitan
description: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.

name: Maractus
description: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

name: Dwebble
description: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.

name: Crustle
description: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.

name: Scraggy
description: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

name: Scrafty
description: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.

name: Sigilyph
description: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.

name: Yamask
description: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.

name: Cofagrigus
description: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

name: Tirtouga
description: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.

name: Carracosta
description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

name: Archen
description: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.

name: Archeops
description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

name: Trubbish
description: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.

name: Garbodor
description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

name: Zorua
description: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Zoroark
description: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Minccino
description: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.

name: Cinccino
description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.

name: Gothita
description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothorita
description: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.

name: Gothitelle
description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

name: Solosis
description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.

name: Duosion
description: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Reuniclus
description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.

name: Ducklett
description: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillish
description: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

name: Vanilluxe
description: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.

name: Deerling
description: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

name: Sawsbuck
description: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.

name: Emolga
description: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.

name: Karrablast
description: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

name: Foongus
description: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: Amoonguss
description: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.

name: Frillish
description: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

name: Jellicent
description: Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

name: Alomomola
description: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.

name: Joltik
description: Since it can’t generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.

name: Galvantula
description: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.

name: Ferroseed
description: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

name: Ferrothorn
description: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.

name: Klink
description: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.

name: Klang
description: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

name: Klinklang
description: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.

name: Tynamo
description: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: Eelektrik
description: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

name: Eelektross
description: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.

name: Elgyem
description: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: Beheeyem
description: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven’t been decoded.

name: Litwick
description: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

name: Lampent
description: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

name: Chandelure
description: Being consumed in Chandelure’s flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

name: Axew
description: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Fraxure
description: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.

name: Haxorus
description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

name: Cubchoo
description: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.

name: Beartic
description: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.

name: Cryogonal
description: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.

name: Shelmet
description: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.

name: Accelgor
description: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.

name: Stunfisk
description: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

name: Mienfoo
description: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.

name: Mienshao
description: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: Druddigon
description: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

name: Golett
description: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

name: Golurk
description: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

name: Pawniard
description: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

name: Bisharp
description: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.

name: Bouffalant
description: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.

name: Rufflet
description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: Braviary
